exchange.question: This fair sounds unbelievable, huh?
exchange.answer: Nothing is unbelievable if you can imagine it. That is the essence of science.

exchange.question: Excited about the fair?
exchange.answer: I cannot wait! I hear there is a giant wheel at this fair that will outdo even my tower in Paris.

exchange.question: Aren't you afraid the Wheel will make your tower look bad?
exchange.answer: Non, non! All great creations should inspire others to even greater heights!
